label: 式部省
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A ministry (shō) in charge of registers of central (naikan) and local officials (gekan), promotions in rank (kurai) and office, appointments, dismissals, palace ceremonies, education, schools, examinations, etc. [内官、外官、位]
